Text:
Very crisp and tough, does not melt, but breaks down into pretty large particles in your mouth. I enjoy it as a cereal, but neither of my 11 mo old twins
really enjoy the tough texture. They like the melt in your mouth and less sugary taste of the happy baby HAPPYBABY Organic Puffs, Banana Puffs, 2.1-Ounce Packages (Pack of 6) or HAPPYBABY Organic Puffs, Greens Puffs, 2.1-Ounce Packages (Pack of 6) which is almost salty.
They also love saltine or ritz crackers Annies brand and those saltines are just as hard to chew and great for teething on.
